publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3973 Mr Frank McAveety: Get Ready for Glasgow Primary Youth Games 2009â€”That the Parliament endorses the Glasgow Primary Youth Games 2009, taking place on 24 April 2009 in the Kelvin Hall, Argyle Street in Glasgow; highlights that this is the 13th year of the Games, which were established in 1996, are open to all schools in Glasgow and promote a variety of sports including athletics, judo, football and orienteering; welcomes the principal aims of the Games, which are to raise the profile of sport in Glasgow schools and provide young people with the opportunity to experience participation in a large-scale sporting event, and particularly appreciates the 2009 Games, in advance of the 2014 Commonwealth Games, for their contribution to raising the level of sports literacy among young people in Glasgow and their inclusive approach towards all young people in Glasgow.
S3M-3973 Get Ready for Glasgow Primary Youth Games 2009 (lodged on 24 April 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-3973 Get Ready for Glasgow Primary Youth Games 2009 (lodged on 24 April 2009) Karen Whitefield*
